title-group.article-title: THE FULL DISCRETE DISCONTINUOUS FINITE ELEMENT ANALYSIS FOR FIRST-ORDER LINEAR HYPERBOLIC EQUATION

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1999 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: In this paper, the full discrete discontinuous Galerkin finite element method to solove 2-dimensional first-order linear hyperbolic problem is considered. Two practical schemes, Euler scheme and Crank-Nicolson scheme, are constructed. For each of them, the stability and error estimation with optimal order approximation is established in the norm stronger than LÂ²-norm.
